snippet: An Egyptian soccer player has been suspended by his team because he celebrated an important goal by raising four fingers in the air, in a gesture of sympathy with Islamist protesters killed by the security forces in August.
abstract: An Egyptian soccer player has been suspended by his team because he celebrated an important goal by raising four fingers in the air, in a gesture of sympathy with Islamist protesters killed by the security forces in August.

headline.main: Egyptian Soccer Star Banned for Expressing Sympathy With Massacred Islamists
